unnormalised: ## Tumchea Prayek Margdarshan: Strirog ani Prasutigrhyog Vixeim Margdarshak
normalised: ## Tumchea Provasak Margdarshan: Strirog ani Prasuti Margdarshak

unnormalised: Strirog ani Prasutigrhyog, chodd korun OB/GYN mhunn vollkhotat, ek mahatvachi vokhdam panth ji baileanchea bholaikek bhettoileli asa. Hantunt prenatal dekhbhal ani bhurgeachem zolmachea velarog ani bailechea utpadan sansthek zait te rog nidan korun upchar korchea sangata zaiti seva samil zata. Hi purn dekhbhal baileank apnnachem jivitbhar borem zait tem dekhun tanchea utpadan sansthek ani bholaikek zai ti seva divpak ek mahatvachi bhumika korta.
normalised: Strirog ani Prasuti, zaka sadharanponnan O-B slash G-Y-N mhontat, vostricho heracho aayogy sambhallpak ek mhotvachem vaidyok shakha darsayta. Hantunt prasuti purvanchi dekhbhal ani ballantponasaun bailanchea utpadan protnak asar korun sthitinche nidan ani upcharantlean vishal seva aspaav aasa. Ho vishal khet bailanche jivitbhar tanchem susth jivitachi khatri kortat, tankam prasuti ani hera hera aayogyacho garjek lagun tanka utar diun.

unnormalised: Prenatal dekhbhal prasutigrhyogachem mull stomb asa. Dr. Aisha Khan Fortis Hospitallantle OB/GYN-che kodden niamit cheking korop avoi ani zolmachem bhurgeak borem asunk gorjechem. He bhetto chodd korun garbhdharanachea 8vea hafta pasun suru zatat ani garbhdharanachea kallbhar thembe themben choltat, poilim mhoineachea bhetto korun survat korun, don hafta ani magir hafta bhet ditat jem zolmachem tarik lagim asta (EDD). Hea apointmenteant jivitachi mahatvachi chintnam (BP, vazon) polletat, gestational diabetes (GDM), ani genetic asvasthatacho patro korun sodtat.
normalised: Prasuti purvanchi dekhbhal prasutichi buniyad aasa. Doctor Aisha Khan Fortis Hospital-ant astole O-B slash G-Y-N kodlean niyamit toran check-up korop avashyak, duyem ani vadtole ballakuy susth dekhun. Hee bhett sadharanponan garbhasthachi aathvea satolleant suru zatat ani garbhasthchea kallar niyamit toran choltat, sodhekden aat sadharanponan masik bhettichem niyam pallun, pachaak don ani magir satolleache bhetticher E-D-D (andazit tarik) lagim yetat. Hee niyukti vitals (B-P, vazan), garbhasthanchea diabetesak (G-D-M) ani janetik naxalponachem chokasheo dhortat.

unnormalised: Bhurgeachem zolm, ek bodolto anubhav, prasutigrhyogacho ek kendracha bhag asa. OB/GYNs kamgar ani zolmacho vevostha kortat ani avoi ani bhurgeachikui borem zata mhunn tankam samballtat. Zolmacho upai vagainal zolmacho asat ani cesarean sections (C-sections) asat, je situveshanacher depend asta. Prasutigrhyogak zai titlem mahatv postpartum samballakui asa, tantun stanponn posrak maddat ani postpartum depressionakui dekhrekh kortat.
normalised: Ballantpon, badlacho anubhav, prasuticho her mhotvacho bhag aasa. O-B slash G-Y-Ns mehenat ani ballantpon sambhalltat, aay ani ballache surkheyechi khatri kortat. Bailantponachi rit vaginanchi zatat ani cearean sections (C-sections) tanchem poristitichea upar dhortat. Prasuti pacho dekhbhal, tankam duudh pieunk madad ani prasuti pacho udasponachi chokasheo prasuti dekhbhalecho mhotvacho bhag aasa.

unnormalised: Gynecology, dusre vatten, bailechea utpadan sansthechea bholaikecher kendrit asa, tantun garbhashai, ovaryo, fallopian tubes, vagina, ani vulva samil zatat. Tantunt sadharan infections, yeast infections (candidiasis) ani bacterial vaginosis (BV) pasun zaitim rog nidan korun upchar kortat ani tantunt tankam karkotak rog zaunk xakta, endomitriosis, polycistic ovary syndrome (PCOS), ani garbhashayachea fibroids.
normalised: Gynecology, dusre vatten, bailanchea utpadan protnacho aayogyacher dhyan diitat, gantt, anddhos, fallopian tubes, vagina ani vulva dhortat. Hantunt vishal poristitichi nidan ani upchar astaat, sadharan sankramanchea upar yeast infections (candidiasis) ani bacterial vaginosis (B-V) saun zaticheo samasyo endometriosis, polycystic ovary syndrome (P-C-O-S) ani uterine fibroids dhortat.

unnormalised: Preventive dekhbhalik niamit gynecological examine kortat. Hea examineant pelvic exam, Pap smear (cervical cancer sodpak), ani breast examine asat. He examine kiteak ditat, hem tichi situation ani Federation of Obstetric and Gynecological Societies of India (FOGSI)sangata bodol zatat. Udharonak, guidelines sangtat ki Pap smears 21-65 vorsam choleailek 3 vorsani korunk zai.
normalised: Niyamit gynecological pariksheo rokanne dekhun khub mhotvachi. Hee pariksheo sadharanponan pelvic exam, a Pap smear (gonddachea canserak chokasheo korunk) ani vokhlo pariksha dhortat. Hee pariksheachi varamvari individual khatrepona karannak ani Federation of Obstetric and Gynecological Societies of India (F-O-G-S-I) asleo sanstha yetat. Udharak, niyam sadharanponan eka Pap smear tin vorsamni chovis saun sath vorsaache bailank sangtat.

unnormalised: Gynecology fertilitychea rogankui zevabdari gheta. OB/GYNs tem couplek bhurgeank zolm divpak adhar kortat tankam evaluation kortat ani jevanacher bodop kartak sangtat ani assisted reproductive technologies (ART) divpak madad kortat, jem in-vitro fertilization (IVF) asta. Delhi ani Mumbaichea xarant atam zaiti fertility clinic uplabd asa ani tanchi safoltechi sonkhya atam vaddot asa.
normalised: Fertility chinta gynecologychea netrant yetat. O-B slash G-Y-Ns tanchea zoddiamk garbhasthak tras zalea uprant fertility nirnay korunk madad kortat, jivnacho jivit badlancho updesh kortat, ani asaist korunk utpadan protnache upai (A-R-T) dhortat in-vitro fertilization (I-V-F) poriant. Delhi ani Mumbai jeo shaharant fertility clinics astaat, zanchi safalta bodli zait aasa.

unnormalised: OB/GYNs zaiti surgical procedures korunk xikshon ghetat, tantunt hysterectomies (garbhashai kaddop), oophorectomies (ovaries kaddop), ani myomectomies (garbhashayachem fibroids kaddop) asat. Minimally invasive techniques, laparoscopy jevotat ani tem rogonek borem zata ani lokar borem zata.
normalised: O-B slash G-Y-Ns tankam vegveglle sarkekar korunk talim aasa, hysterectomies (gantt kaddun uddovop), oophorectomies (anddh kaddun uddovop), ani myomectomies (uterine fibroids kaddun uddovop). Unni-adhik hamleachio ritio, laparoscopy jevio, tanchea recoverycho vell unno korunk ani asankak bore upay divnk vapartat.

unnormalised: Ani, ho vishai vegllea piraicho lokank veglli dekhbhal dita. Tarun bailek OB/GYNs menstruation, contraception, ani sharirik bholaikek margdarshan kortat. Utpadan vorsanchea baileank, tankam family-planning seva, prenatal dekhbhal, ani gynecological rogank dekhbhal kortat. Postmenopausal baileank, tem hormonal bodlak lagun uprastek rogank, osteoporosis, ani pelvic floor asvasthatank dekhbhal kortat.
normalised: Adhik ponnant, hee shakha vegvegllea vayo groupachea samasyak uttar diitat. Juvan bailank O-B slash G-Y-Ns menstruation, contraception ani sexual susthak margdarshan kortat. Tanchea utpadanchea vorsaache bailank, te gharkarn korpacho seva, prasuti purvanchi dekhbhal ani gynecological sthitinche sambhall ditaat. Postmenopausal bailank, te hormonal bodlacho, osteoporosis ani pelvic floor nashethicho chinta ditaat.

unnormalised: OB/GYN-n special dekhbhal sadharan asa. Kaim dotor sub-specialize kortat, zoxe maternal-fetal medicine (khotardicho garbhdharan), reproductive endocrinology ani infertility, gynecologic oncology (bailechea utpadan sanstheche cancers), ani urogynecology (pelvic floor asvasthatam). Ashea subspecialistanchi bhetto korunchem poili sadharan OB/GYN-kuch pollounk podta.
normalised: O-B slash G-Y-N bhitor vishesh dekhbhaluy sadharanponnan asta. Thodde doctors vishesh jagar maternal-fetal medicine (chodd khatrea ponacheo garbhasth), reproductive endocrinology ani infertility, gynecologic oncology (bailanche utpadanchea cantser), ani urogynecology (pelvic floor nashethi) dhortat. Asole subspecialistsak niyukti ek sadharan O-B slash G-Y-N kadlean referral magta.

unnormalised: Nimannim, Strirog ani Prasutigrhyog ek asa vishai ji bailanchea bholaikek samball pak zevabdari gheta. Niamit cheking, preventive screenings, ani gynecological rogank taktik dekhbhal kortat. Ek OB/GYN-chi dekhbhal dakoit zalear Dr. R. Kumar at AIIMS mhunn vorsak ek pavtti vottunchem ani bailek kitim tras asa tem sangchem, tankam tankam chodd dekhbhal mellta.
normalised: Nimanne, Obstetrics and Gynecology ek vishal shakha zaka bailanche susth jivit sambhallpak mhotvachem vaato aasa. Niyamit check-ups, rokne chokashe ani gynecological sthitinche upchar korunk susth sambhallpak mhotvachem. Ek hunnarvant O-B slash G-Y-N kodlean gheunk zata Doctor R. Kumar A-I-I-M-S ant kam kortat atle ek varamni vo zai poddlear, bailank ghairajibdarponnan tancho aayogy sambhallpak ani kitemuy chinta assa takai uttar diunk mhotvachem.
